1.4.6.name: wordpress/wp-e-commerce-exporter
1.4.6.description:
Export store details out of WP e-Commerce into a CSV-formatted file.

Features include:

  • Export Products (*)
  • Export Categories
  • Export Tags
  • Export Orders (**)
  • Export Customers (**)
  • Export Coupons (**)

(*) Compatible with Product Importer Deluxe, All in One SEO Pack, Advanced Google Product Feed, Custom Fields, Related Products and more. (**) Requries the Pro upgrade to enable additional store export functionality.

For more information visit: http://www.visser.com.au/wp-ecommerce/
